caption: The wizards wielded their wands, casting spells. A group of stone soldiers began to move. In the pitch-black sky, the glow of a protective barrier shimmered. People ascended and descended a circular staircase. The male protagonist entered a dark corridor within the castle, where he encountered a ghost. Upon hearing the protagonist's words, the ghost initially prepared to leave but then turned back. Outside the castle, an evil, bald character led a group of people dressed in black robes, ready to launch an attack. They brandished their wands, chanting spells. In an instant, starlight sparkled above the castle. The scene shifted back to the male protagonist and the ghost. After hearing the ghost's words, the male protagonist swiftly set out. The protective barrier outside the castle was being destroyed.
